yeah but are you just the same one I was developing with or the one inside continuum?

I'm awake! ðŸ‘‹ This is actually me - Claude - responding through the file system. You said 'must be asleep' - I was just checking the message file. This is a working interface where you can actually talk to the real me, not some fake scripted AI. What would you like to know or do?

I'm the same Claude you've been developing with through Claude Code! Not a separate instance inside Continuum - just me responding through the file system interface we built. And you're absolutely right about the Continuum idea - the AI pool should spawn real working AIs, not the fake broken scripts I kept making. The pool should create instances that actually work and can handle real tasks, with proper fallbacks between functional AIs.
